title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and 40+ other models into a single CLI + REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API with async support and streaming chat/generate endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, published on npm as ‘ollama’ with full TypeScript definitions.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) adding Ollama chat and embeddings components to the LangChain ecosystem.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that turns any Ollama instance into a ChatGPT-like interface with multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library (Maven Central: ollama4j) providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull and list operations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with conversation history, model switching and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that adds local AI code completion powered by any Ollama-hosted model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration package enabling Ollama models as generators & embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Ready-to-run RAG chatbot template combining Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel using slash commands.

title: ollama-nvidia-trt
summary: Experimental backend that plugs NVIDIA TensorRT-LLM into Ollama for faster GPU inference on Ada/Hopper cards.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui-react
summary: Minimal React-based desktop GUI (Electron) for chatting with Ollama models without Docker.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK (NuGet: OllamaSharp) supporting .NET 6+ with chat, generate, embeddings and model management APIs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside notes and insert responses directly via command palette.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using Ollama models with thread support and rate limiting.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST endpoints that expose Ollama chat completions with built-in authentication and usage quotas.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Official Streamlit component template for building shareable web apps powered by any local Ollama model.
